body.p: This section presents the support for the Feedback-Enabled WebHelp system.

has the ability to transform DocBook documents into feedback-enabled WebHelp systems. The Feedback system allows you to view discussion threads in a tree-like representation, reply to already posted comments, and use stylized comments.
allows you to publish DocBook 4 documents into a WebHelp with Feedback format that provides Table of Contents and advanced search capabilities.
To publish DocBook 4 to WebHelp with Feedback, use the DocBook WebHelp with Feedback transformation scenario. To further customize the out-of-the-box transformation, you can edit its parameters:
For further information about all the DocBook transformation parameters, go to http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl/current/doc/fo/index.html.
